“Our Home Renovation was perfect”

Glazed Construction excelled in both planning and execution of our total home renovation. Costs and timeframes were clearly communicated. Thanks to Glazed Construction we had a hassle free, happy experience in turning our 100 year old house into a modern eco-friendly home.
Stickson Family

“Working here is awesome”

I am glad for the insightfulness, responsiveness and speed of work Glazed Consutrction has exhibited through the outline, development and construction of our  office. Cooperation is fundamental to any undertaking; the Starbucks and Glazed Construction teams functioned admirably together to accomplish a five star location.
Peter Williams, Starbucks
